Class ConnectedGraph

      • build

        public void build(Image image)
        Build a connected graph based on an input image, with all neighborhoods and input/exit nodes in place.
        Parameters:
        image - Input image with correctly color-labeled walls and entry/exit points.

      • addEdge

        public void addEdge(int nodeIndex,
                    int neighborIndex,
                    int direction,
                    double weight)
        Add a bidirectional neighborhood for two nodes.
        Parameters:
        nodeIndex - Index of the originating node in the graph.
        neighborIndex - Index of the neighbor node in the graph.
        direction - Direction of neighborhood (0-7); used as an inner index.
        weight - Edge weight (cost).

        nodeIndex - Index of the requested origin node.
        Returns:
        An array of edges.
